name: My Fickle Son
description:
Submission for IGDA's Retro Game Jam!

It is the seventies! And a new form of wicked technology has been released to corrupt your little kids: 

VIDEO GAMES.

But you are old, and have not been able to keep up with the trends. Your fickle son (tm) keeps begging you to buy him the latest games! (for him to eat).


Keep your son well fed, well hydrated, well excercized, and well-played!

OR ELSE.

Credits:

Programmers:

Thom Cote

Luke Mayo

Artists:

Cole Funke

Austin Frick
